info.name: RemyCareConnect API v2
info.description: Complete API collection for RemyCareConnect maternal health management system. Includes comprehensive error handling, logging examples, and organized endpoints for mothers, CHWs, nurses, and next of kin management.

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy
